review: I tried Apple TV and was seriously bummed to find the experience not-so-great. But Amazon certainly restored my faith in the digital TV watching experience!The Amazon Fire TV has an easy to manage setup with helpful tips and reminders (great if you're not a video or tech wiz) and it's BY FAR the best browsing experience I've ever seen.Simply navigate to the apps you use or have an account with (like Netflix, Hulu, YouTube, etc.) and sign in, then start watching.

author: rod h.

review: After having my Amazon Fire TV for a few weeks, I am disappointed. There aren't enough choices on Prime that are worth while to watch, actually I feel it is mostly "junk" that at least my family doesn't want to watch. From there you have to either rent or buy movies and this is not why I bought the Fire TV. I ordered the game controller at the same time I bought my Fire TV, and now I have been told I might not even get that until April or May...very disappointed!!! I see right now it is not available, they should have had it listed that way in December when I ordered it! Again, disappointed. I go back and forth on whether I even want to keep this, but I think I just went past the time to return it. Amazon might not have control of the Apps available, but I find the YouTube app extremely difficult to use and to find things on YouTube to watch, and this was important to me. The only things positive about the Fire TV is the ease to hook up and the voice search works very well...although when you search it WILL list what you were searching for but then no results will come up. Such as..you search for a particular movie, it will list it..so you think they have it. But when you select it, it's not really there so a list of other movies will come up. I have been frustrated since the beginning and had I known all this I would have never wasted my money on the Fire TV.
author: Twinrocks

review: Absolutely the best device ever made for an enhanced Kindle experience. I have used my Fire TV every single day since receiving it as a Christmas gift. I now can't imagine watching my Prime TV and movies any other way; this device has changed how I watch television. In fact, we like it so much that we will be purchasing a second Fire TV device for another room in our home.
author: Kindle Customer

review: I bought Amazon Fire TV for my husband for Christmas and are Amazon Prime members. We had a few weeks to try it out before our Prime came up for renewal (with the price increase!) and we love it! We decided to keep the Prime so we could binge-watch all the "no extra cost" series that are available. Although the rentals are pretty inexpensive, there is so much to watch that is included in the Prime Membership, we may never find a reason to justify it.The set up was easy, the picture is crisp & clear on our HD screen, and the remote is simple. I've not tried the games - not really my thing - but have some of the apps which are fun to use.
